```{r,message=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)

```

```{r, }
metabric <- read.csv("C:/Users/Natally Vidal/OneDrive - University of Puerto Rico/datos de R/Nuevo-Proyecto-de-R/tareas/brca_metabric_clinical_data.csv")%>%
  clean_names()
head(metabric[, 1:5])
```


```{r}
ggplot(metabric, aes(x = type_of_breast_surgery, 
                     y = tumor_size)) +
  geom_violin(fill = "pink", color = "black") +
  geom_point(shape = 8, color = "red", size = 3)+
  labs(x = "Tipo de cirugía mamaria",
       y = "Tamaño del tumor (mm)",
       title = "Distribución del tamaño tumoral según el tipo de cirugía") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"))

```
